name: Back To Hell
description:
This adventure game of the old-school “platformer” genre tells the story about a girl named Shizuka who goes to Devil Mountain to send the devil back to Hell. One fine day, the dark clouds covered the sky and the darkness fell on the town where Shizuka lived. Demons settled on the streets of the town, and there was no one to save the town besides Shizuka. Help Shizuka get to the top of Devil Mountain, send the devil back to Hell and save her town.

Using the arrow buttons, displayed on the screen, control the game character and jump between the platforms. Moving between nine locations, collect and use things that you find.
